scripts.build-go: cd ~/dev/wowmate && cd services/migrate && rm main && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .  && cd ../summary && rm main && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .  && cd ../import  && rm main && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main . && cd ../api && rm main && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && go build -ldflags='-s -w' -o main . && cd ../convert && rm main && go mod tidy && gofmt -w -s . && CGO_ENABLED=0 GOOS=linux go build -a -installsuffix cgo -ldflags='-s -w' -o main .
scripts.build: cd ~/dev/wowmate && npm run build-go && cd services/presign && npm install && cd ../.. && tsc
scripts.buildf: cd services/frontend && yarn build && cd ../.. && tsc
